Jun 20, 2007 ... That movie is full of great ones, though. Diabeetus ... Clint Eastwood in Bridges of 
Madison County. Songbird ... I say it at every wedding buffet.
search_results.title: Underrated lines in movies | Page 5 | SportsJournalists.com

question: In this film, Clint Eastwood says, "Hell of a thing, killin' a man. Ya take away all he's got and all he's ever gonna have"
